pr_title: Add subtyping feature and improvements to the Ballerina bindgen tool

timeline.message: Fix the issue with loading inner classes
Fix the issue with reading the constants file
Improve the file structure of generated bindings and error handling
Add object tags for all implemented interfaces
Fix the issue with getting string array from handle
Fix issues related to type mappings
Fix a compilation issue in the generated template
Add review changes to the code

I will address this issue in a later PR by identifying all the incompletely generated bindings and giving a separate output or a detailed log file.
